definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Tom’s neighbour was snatched by the FBI.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的邻居被联邦调查局抓走了。

sentences.english: Ms. Lee entered on duty with the FBI as a special agent in 1986.
sentences.chinese: 1986年，李作为一名特工进入联邦调查局。

sentences.english: I hate being stood over by the FBI.
sentences.chinese: 我可讨厌受到联邦调查局的监视。

sentences.english: “Don’t fight the Fed, ” say the old-timers.
sentences.chinese: “别打架联邦调查局调查员，”老前辈说。

sentences.english: I was expecting you. Are you NYPD or FBI?
sentences.chinese: 恭候多时了。你们是纽约警局的还是联邦调查局的？

sentences.english: The Director of the FBI would contribute.
We now know the identity of the federally-quarantined tuberculosis patient.
sentences.chinese: 现已确认了被联邦调查局隔离的肺结核病者的身份。

sentences.english: The FBI wanted to storm them, too.
sentences.chinese: 联邦调查局当时也想对这些人发动强攻。

sentences.english: Read the FBI alert to make sure you are donating to legitimate organizations.
sentences.chinese: 请阅读联邦调查局的警告，确保您是向合法组织捐赠。

sentences.english: " The G-man seemed deeply impressed. "You don't say!
sentences.chinese: 联邦调查局的人看上去好象有很深的印象。

sentences.english: The FBI closed their cases since criminal behavior was not found.
sentences.chinese: 联邦调查局因找不到刑事罪行的行为而把案件结束。

sentences.english: Save that for the CIA, FBI, and the Department of Homeland Security.
sentences.chinese: 让中央情报局，联邦调查局和国土安全部来做这些吧。

sentences.english: Makin' a fool of the bureau?
sentences.chinese: 把整个联邦调查局都当傻子了？

definition: US Central Intelligence Agency, CIA/abbr. for 中央情報局|中央情报局[Zhong1 yang1 Qing2 bao4 ju2]
Edward Snowden (1983-), American surveillance program whistleblower
Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
pinyin: Xi1 la1 li3 · Ke4 lin2 dun4
